uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.forms.html

Class HTMLUpdateForm<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.forms.factory.UpdateForm<T>
      • uk.ac.ed.epcc.webapp.forms.html.HTMLUpdateForm<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of object being updated

    public class HTMLUpdateForm<T>
extends UpdateForm<T>
    Utility class to do standard Object update via a HTML Form, defaults to the standard Forms generated by the FormUpdate object but these can be overridden by calling the setForm and setObject/setSelectForm methods before invoking the Form code
    Author:
    spb
